title: How Patricia Bonaldi Built PatBo Into a New York Fashion Week Favorite
description: Watch the full conversation between Patricia Bonaldi and Fashionista Staff Writer Janelle Sessoms on The Fashionista Network. "Everything started with my mom," PatBo founder Patricia Bonaldi told Janelle Sessoms on The Fashionista Network. (Watch it here!) Reflecting on her childhood in Brazil, the ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri
